### Invitation to Bid: Business Consultant - Senior
#### Tender Reference Number: T8080-220436

We invite all qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of senior business consulting services in support of Transport Canada's new enforcement approach.

#### Overview
Transport Canada is seeking a senior business consultant with specialized regulatory enforcement experience to provide expertise in multi-modal and program level enforcement design, as well as subject matter expertise to support best practices in regulatory law enforcement delivery.

#### Contract Details
* **Contract Type:** Secondment
* **Length of Contract:** SIX MONTHS
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Limited Tendering
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Objectives and Technical Specifications
The successful bidder is expected to:

* Provide critical regulatory enforcement advice and recommendations on policy changes, regulations, and enforcement procedures
* Support application of best practices in regulatory law enforcement, including an emphasis on the evolving use of intelligence-led enforcement integrating surveillance, data analytics, and historical information
* Contribute to designing a transportation enforcement strategy that incorporates lessons learned and best practices

#### How to Bid
For complete details, please refer to the RFP document available at the following link: 
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/e5c1817e89812b495aa765b13ee34d09/t8080-220436_-_npp.pdf>

#### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-22, 16:00 hours (Eastern Time Zone)
* **Contact Information:**
